Description: Burnished black-topped red pottery jar with pointed base and flaring sides, drawn in towards everted rim.
Curator's comments: Published: A. Roveri and F. Tiradritte [eds.], Kemet: Alle Sorgenti del Tempo, Ravenna 1998, pp.148-149 [43-45].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1 Sep 1997-London, Museum of Mankind, 'Pottery in the Making'.
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
